summary: I HAVE A 02 SIVERADO A 5,000 MILES THE MOTOR STARTED KNOCKING, THE DEALERSHIP SAID IT'S OUT OF THERE HANDS, AND TOLD US TO CALL CHEVROLET DOCUMENT #816465, WHICH SAYS THE KNOCKING IS NORMAL, AND ALL THEY CAN DO IS EXTEND THE WARRANTY. WE ALL KNOW THIS IS NOT NORMAL,GO TO WWW.BIGCLASSACTION.COM AND FILE A COMPLAINT. IF WE CAN GET EVERYONE TOGETHER WE CAN GET A CLASS ACTION SUIT AGAINST THEM. WE ALL HAVE PAID TO MUCH FOR OUR VEHICLES TO LETGM  GET BY WITH THIS. LETS STICK TOGETHER, TELL EVERY ONE.
